channel.title: How do u add the ::bow command?
channel.description: How do you add the ::bow command? There is a command where the owner can type ::bow and everyone on the server will bow and say "All hail, Superman!" well it doesnt have to be superman thats just my name.....lol yea its dumb can u just tell me how thank you =]

item.title: How do u add the ::bow command?
item.dc:creator: @xx_qwertyuiop_xx xx qwertyuiop xx
item.description:
@xx_qwertyuiop_xx wrote:

Motoguyx378:

lol? thats not gonna help me make the ::bow command…

It will definitely help you in the long run. Trust me.
Edit: http://java.sun.com/docs/books/tutorial/index.html is more in depth, btw.

item.title: How do u add the ::bow command?
item.dc:creator: @P_I_M_P_3_D_Tut `Lewk_
item.description:
@P_I_M_P_3_D_Tut wrote:

Yes it will… If you would take the time to read it, You could make a “bow” Command in 5 seconds…
Read the basics about ints , Booleans and shit. I gave you the wrong link
http://www.google.ca/search?hl=en&q=java+basics&btnG=Google+Search&meta=
Once you have an ounce of java inside your brain You can read over some methods inside your shit source.
Your not going to be spoon fed.

Read full topic
